title: 3 and Out Weekend Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out Weekend Mailbag
description:
With training camp is in full swing, John answers listener questions and empties out the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd
